reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad at all, just a bit small
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the classic version. This shaving cream actually works better than I thought it would. You can spread it on your face with your hand and/or use a brush to lather. A lot of other creams I tried, instead of lathering more, disappear when I use a brush. This one gives a decent foam but doesn’t foam up as much as shown in the product picture with the amount I am using (which is enough for shaving my face), so I suspect you’ll run through the tube quickly if you want a rich foam. It does soften the skin well, and I went through shaving without a nick even though I am using a classic barber’s razor. I didn’t notice the tube would be this small, despite the word “travel” in its description. The tube comes sealed under the cap and inside a sealed box, which gave me a good first impression. I think it is a bit expensive for its size, but there is nothing wrong with it as a shaving cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super moisturizing! Lathers up quick! A little goes a very long way! Tube is not large but because you need so little to get the job done, it will last awhile! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel- and sensitive face-friendly men’s shave cream - “ultra slick” reduces nicks and cuts!
reviews.reviewText: At first test, I had great success applying this “ultra slick” men’s shaving cream by Lakerain, following the instructions on the box, prepping with cleanser and warm water. Second test, I applied it dry, and it worked just as well, and I didn’t feel irritation or pulling from my 2-day old safety razor.Application is smooth, and the feeling is as described on the Brand page (HWSHQY OO) - “Ultra Slick”. I have some sensitivity to certain shave creams, including Aloe Vera infused, but had only a pleasant reaction to this one.There are two options, CLASSIC ORIGINAL (red box - the one I tested) and VANILLA (green box). I can attest that the cream I tested softens my beard, had a pleasant (mostly subtle citrus) fragrance, and cleaned with warm water without leaving an oily residue. It compares favorably to higher end shave treatments (I’ve tried so many of them!)At the size of this tube, 1 fluid ounce, for me it is an automatic travel-friendly companion. I use just a drop so the tube should last me a few business trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Creamy!
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream is nice and thick and lathers into a really nice cream, it worked really well in conjunction with my safety razor. I experienced no razor burning and no nicks. Worked out perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Travel size shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: Nice size for carry on bags. It’s a cream in lotion form, less messy than foams. Great for getting a close non irritating shave, very slick. Mild scent. Rinsed away easily. Approved for faces and legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lakerain easy to store tube, great smelling smooth shaving cream.
reviews.reviewText: I have been a Barbasol user for about 20+ years. I got this Lakerain product as a prepper storage supply item and thought I better use it to make sure it is what I want. Wow! If you are an aerosol product user, do yourself a favor and switch over... now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slick, Smooth, Small
reviews.reviewText: I missed this was travel size. Oh well. It's awesome and reminds me a lot of the brand "Cremo" and works just as well. Perfect for shaving out of town. It goes on smooth, doesn't irritate skin and moisturizes the skin as it promises toExcellent stuff. Hope a bigger size comes along
